post.body: Heee. I misread what kind of pot you mean and jumped to entirely wrong conclusions. (Been in the bay area too long, I guess.)
Forget the Everclear. When ash covers the sun, I'm fetching that Veuve Clicquot La Grande Dame Rose stashed in my steamertrunk. :)
Save that Everclear for the apocalypse. You can use it to staunch wounds.
HNNNNGH.
I doubt @warrenellis enjoys being called "Daddy" by anyone but an exquisite goth girl with a pert butt and a bottle of Oban.
AWWW! HI! Adding you back.
(Lifelong obsession with Chick Tracts. Don't ask.)
Oh god. That's the one that kicks off w/ "little John is wobbly" & has a LaVeyan satanist in one panel, right?
(Over the phone, yes.)
Bun is sculpting a human skull for an anatomy DVD series. We're both huge TMBG fans and we've been yowling it all day. :)
Ugh. Unisom is NOT good. What happened to yer Ambien script?
"I'M SO EXCITED. I'M SO EXCITED. I'M... SO... SCARED." http://tinyurl.com/ff2rn
Thx. We actually put Issue 02 to bed last week. I have other fish to fry right now.
Pants shmantz. That rubber chicken looks far more dignified on you.
Those "Do and Don't" columns are so vile and cruel and entertaining... I can feel a piece of my soul dying every time I laugh.
Oh shit! That reminds me, I got something to send you... :)
Love #6 with that oxidated look. Very beautiful.
Way too self-berating to be properly psychobilly. *stabs own eye out with switchblade comb* BAAWWWWWW.
YOU ARE GETTING A NOOGIE, MISTER.
Hater.
"I can hit you so hard with my butt that you will forget your favorite film."
Cabin Fever wasn't ALL bad. Come on, this is freaking amazing: http://tinyurl.com/2b5pap
Marsupials ain't got nothin' on those humble monotremes. It's all about warm-blooded, mammalian egg-laying. Viva le platypus!!
Please give my regards to Jill. Sorry to be missing her yet again. Buried under piles of work and worn a bit thin.
Oooooh. That's gorgeous.
Syphilitic Mermaids FTW. That sounds like my kind of publication!
Oh, man.... I am a foul creature for loving that scene as much as I did. My laughter scared the dog.
Gotta love this guy: http://tinyurl.com/6xlwos
Amen. This po-po-po-mo bullshit has got to STOP.
Hi, pretty! It will be hard to take pictures of you while I'm wearing a brown paper bag over my head, but yeah!! :D
Thank you! Issue #02 is coming soooooooon.
Email me at theremina at gmail. We'll work out a PayPal, if you like.
Nah. Too old, too fat, too prone to fart jokes. @zoetica gets all the stalkers.
WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!!
I was just there with Faun Fables, stinker!
I'm well aware. But the head-stomping-date-rapist-jocktard-in-vinyl-pants thing just seems more cultivated with Combichrist.
At least VNVN aren't actively TRYING to be cunts. ("Shut up and swallow" "I am a bitch/I am a slut/please hold me down") etc barf.
@wilw I love you guys. Also? DUNK. And sure enough, I feel better now.
Ugh. Honestly, dunno why I bother sometimes. Need a drink. Or five.
That's brilliant. Thank you.
It's happened to @coilhouse a couple times. Scary, but it made us feel giddy in a Sally Fields accepting an Oscar kind of way.
I really like portrait #23 and #49.
Congrats on that crash, guys! FREAKANGELS IS HYOOOOOOGE.
Eep, actually, #3 is already filled-to-bursting with content, but nudge us again down the line.
Hell yeah. Call you tomorrow. xox
Nope. Look for Xeni in @coilhouse at some point down the line.
I really need to go back to Venice Beach and buy some of that guy's soap. PS: You. Are. Amazing.
Congrats, sweetheart!
Ack! Be careful up there. All that bone-deep dampness + ice = extra achey.
I really wish I could hear five minutes of ALL of my friends' little kid babble. Lifelong personality traits develop EARLY.
Dude. Have I ever mentioned to you how beautiful I think your family is? All jokes, all gripes aside. You three amaze me.
To clarify: don't wanna take digs @ marriage/childrearing. Just resent having others tell me my own happiness depends on it.
Mmmm. Crotchfruit. Ghlllaaaghhhaaaglaallle.
You can haz. Very soon. We will post more #02 bloggage on the site soon.
Oh, I'm sorry. Did I tweet that out loud?
fuck
STAB KICK SHRIEK SOB CACKLE RETCH
(I'm tickled anyone cares what I tweet. Thankee.)
Waitaminute, whaaa? 400 followers? Seriously? Who ARE you people? More importantly, who's your daddy and what does he do?
Fine. Snark away. But every time Karen O says "wait, they don't love you like I love you" I flinch a little. I know exactly what she means.
HUMAN SKULL. ON THE GROUND. TURN AROUND.
Got a gorgeous brassy heavy duty mint green antique steamer trunk. Mint condition, too. AND got a huge discount for "having such a prett ...
Greg Scharpen is interviewing me over at KALX tomorrow afternoon! Tune in, have a mimosa with me: http://kalx.berkeley.edu/womens.htm
why why why O why iz eye still awakes
Argh. Traffic and stupidity conspired to make me late to the interview. Did anyone listen in? Was I coherent?
By tomorrow, I mean Saturday. :)
There's a large, lone swan in Lake Merritt. She is very beautiful, and likes to talk to strangers. Wonder where she came from.
Yeeeeee Fungus Fair was BEE YOO TEE FUL. Ran into lots of chums, too. Happyhappies.
is on her way to the Oakland Museum Fungus Fair. Ridiculously excited.
Recently found Facebook group: "I Never Knew Mimes Could Be Erotic Until I Layed My Eyes Upon Brian Viglione" Snorted coffee through nose.
Bye Bye, Bettie http://tinyurl.com/6rsbqd
Welcome, @warrenellis minions! I haz a pretty picture fuh yuh: http://i73.photobucket.com/albums/i208/jaznb/MonkeySuckingDick.jpg
Brushing up on violin and theremin bits for upcoming Amanda Palmer show at Bimbo's.
24 hours later I'm still reeling over this: http://flickr.com/photos/theremina/3100481511/
Weeeeeee!!! Ice skating with Bricey!!!
Please. Make Combichrist go away, or at the very least, stop being so hatefully STUPID. Please.
The day I can play this fucker WITHOUT unintentionally make people laugh? That will be the day I can honestly and proudly call myself a ...
Ugh. Nerves. Choked in soundcheck. Hard to stay calm and serene when the whole room automatically starts cracking up at a theremin.
Sitting in on some tunes w/Amanda Palmer today at Bimbo's. Come say hi!
(No context for you.)
Can I just say? I'm always immensely pleased with myself when I manage to gross out @warrenellis.
"New York I love you, but you're bringing me down."
Waitaminute, wait. They made a Day the Earth Stood Still remake WITH NO THEREMIN? I CALL MAXIMUM MOOSE-DICK-SUCK ON THAT. Pardon my French.
Happy birthday, @Frauenfelder!! Thank you for all the wonderful things.
Ooooo. They have Arrogant Bastard Ale on Amtrak now.
Phew! Whirlwind 24 hrs in LA complete. On a southbound Amtrak to see my folks. Cafe car, Corona with lime, holiday tyme! How I love trav ...
(I don't scare easy with horror films. This one has a 70s feel: Excorcist, Rosemary's Baby. Long drawn-out silences, dread, anticipation.)
Director friend just screened me some clips of a horror film I'll be scoring. Actually more than a couple of genuinely terrifying moments.
My LA day in a nutshell: face to face confirmation that @xenijardin is a so0per g3nius and @nadya turning a sow's ear into a silk purse.
Oakland to LAX for @coilhouse biz. Got NO frgn sleep last nite. Pray I get a nap in. Drooling on VIP during interview? DO NOT WANT.
Transferring/editing tape from 1978 as gift for folks. Baby Mer going on and on about how Captain Kirk is coming for Christmas. NERD 4 LIFE!
I'll be here all week, folks.
(Meanwhile, I'm just going to keep tweeting about #02 BLOCKAGE to annoy Warren.)
